exec: // Finding the values to set to globals
// Use data to populate immediately relevant data to continue flow.
pm.environment.set("paymentId", paymentId);                                                 // These will only be set if the operation is found
pm.globals.set("operationRedirectPayment", redirectPayment ? redirectPayment.href : "N/A"); // This is to avoid using data of wrong payment
pm.globals.set("operationSeamlessPayment", seamlessPayment ? seamlessPayment.href : "N/A"); // Furthermore you will get an error
pm.globals.set("operationAbortPayment", abortPayment ? abortPayment.href : "N/A");          // when trying to use N/A data.

body.raw:
{
    "paymentorder": {
        "operation": "Purchase",
        "amount": 10000,
        "vatAmount": 0,
        "currency": "SEK",
        "description": "test description",
        "language": "sv-SE",
        "userAgent": "Mozilla/5.0",
        "disablePaymentMenu": false,
        "orderItems": [
            {
                "reference": "P1",
                "name": "Product1",
                "type": "PRODUCT",
                "class": "ProductGroup1",
                "itemUrl": "https://www.demoshop.com/shop/id=666",
                "imageUrl": "https://www.demoshop.com/product1.jpg",
                "description": "Product 1 description",
                "discountDescription": "Volume discount",
                "quantity": 2,
                "quantityUnit": "pcs",
                "unitPrice": 2500,
                "discountPrice": 0,
                "vatPercent": 0,
                "amount": 5000,
                "vatAmount": 0
            },
            {
                "reference": "P2",
                "name": "Product2",
                "type": "PRODUCT",
                "class": "ProductGroup1",
                "description": "Product 2 description",
                "quantity": 5.00,
                "quantityUnit": "kg",
                "unitPrice": 1000,
                "vatPercent": 0,
                "amount": 5000,
                "vatAmount": 0
            }
        ],
        "urls": {
        	"hostUrls": [
        		"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Host"
    		],
            "completeUrl": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Success",
            "cancelUrl": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cancel",
            "callbackUrl": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Callback",
            "termsOfServiceUrl": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Terms_Of_Service",
            "logoUrl": "https://design.swedbankpay.com/v/4.5.0/img/swedbankpay-logo.svg"
        },
        "payeeInfo": {
            "payeeId": "734310b0-f9b5-48ea-b730-b3628d907f0c",
            "payeeReference": "someUniquereference123897",
            "payeeName": "test merchant"
        }
    }
}
